name: bionic-reader
description: A Chrome extension for translating pages to bionic reading, which can be very beneficial to neurodiverse readers.

scripts.build: if [ -f "artifacts/$npm_package_version.zip" ]; then echo 'Artifact already exists under this version.'; else zip -r artifacts/$npm_package_version.zip . -x '*.git*' -x '*.DS_Store' -x 'node_modules*' -x 'tests*' -x 'artifacts*' -x 'package*json' -x 'docs*'; fi
